content.detailedDescription: I woke up, from sleeping in my bed. i looked out my window and saw several of these creatures gliding down my back dirt road. they seemed to have visited some of the neighbors and were taking some of them back and forth to the field that is by my house.  i thought to myself my god what do i do and that i was happy they didn't notice me. i got the feeling they were not friendly. just when i thought they hadn't seen me looking at them through the window, one pops up right in front of me on the other side of the window screen, i remember the razor like teeth then everything went black. i remember waking up thinking it was a really vivid dream, but since then my family changed drastically, neighbors changed, i've had several vivid dreams about aliens and being on some type of spaceship and experiments taking place and the weirdest things have happened to me in life that don't happen to most people. since then very little has gone right and i just feel like i don't fit in. i've also had several mysterious illnesses that can't be identified. i've also seen different color lights in my bedroom and other stuff has taken place. its been 30 yrs. and as i rack my brain for an explanation why my life is the way it is, i always end up back to that incident when shortly after that things just weren't right and kept progressively getting worst. i feel strongly more is there locked in my brain that would come out hopefully through hypnosis or something like that. thanks for ur time. [name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Saw 3 to 4 ft creatures covered with a black cape and hood gliding down my dirt road in middle of night

content.detailedDescription: 4 bright vertical lights merged to 1 small dimmer light, descended extremely fast and accelerated to high speed west/southwest over i-5, direction changed to opposite.  lights un-merged to 3 bright lights.  had to be moving 250+mph merely feet above ground to the east of i-5. extremely sharp turns, shape seemed to morph but seemed fixed near end of sighting. many people on i-5 slowed or stopped to observe. just north of grapevine. please call for more detail. i don't believe in ufo's but this is seriously bothering me.. hoping for a reasonable explanation.
content.summary: 4 lights merged to 1, descended and accelerated to high speed over i-5, lights un-merged to 3

content.detailedDescription: I live by a school called southeast school which is where i was. my dads friend was drinking and told me on several occasions he sees ufos. i blew it off but i know this man is definatly a good source on fema,illumanti,ufo, etc. it was summer i remember it was nice out. he wanted to prove me wrong, and i wanted to prove he was crazy. theirs a farm field, and barn located on school property out front of my fathers house. he said lets just go check out the stars, n talk. i had nothing to do i didn't have to work. we went out, and sat around n just were talking . i remember him saying look. theirs a radio tower going same direction as the school to right of it couple miles away ide say. above it a ball of light appeared. i noticedand thought this was just a plane. but it stood in one spot like a star. it did this for about couple minutues.Than slowly moved forward, than stopped.After about 30 seconds this light shot back at a diagonal..Stood in different spot for roughly 10-15 seconds than slowly started moving than just shot off like a "shooting star" that ive seen. i knew planes blink, i know they go in usual same direction, or that the technology i know of could not perform how quick this object only moved, but also stood still. at the time who would i tell? my dads friend was like i told you so. i knew he knew something. to this day it astonishes me. i learned of mufon a year ago. i know this is definatly relative.I never wrote down the date, nor time. but i know was in 2009 summer months. at the time i never intended on tellin anyone for fear of being called crazy.
content.summary: Definatly changed my perspect of ufo's, and other human beings.

content.detailedDescription:
This event took place at approximately 10:15pm on may 01, 2015:      
 
i had just downloaded a mobile sky app on my phone and was out on the back deck with my sister, who had also downloaded the same app on her phone. after looking for a few minutes we both stepped back in the house. i had seen a bright star in the northwest sky just at twilight and decided to step back out onto the deck in an attempt to identify it.  as i stepped out onto the deck, something to my right, in the southeast horizon, caught my attention.  at first, i thought it was another star that had just become visible but i realized it was much larger in size than anything i had been looking at and also that the color was much different.  it was a bright distinct yellow/orange orb or oval shaped object, brighter than any star and it was very low on the horizon moving directly in my direction. it seemed as if it was out quite far but as it moved forward, in a slightly northern direction, it was closer.  as if in a blink of an eye, a second object, exactly like the first, appeared slightly to the right of the first object.  as they got closer to my position, the orbs, or objects began to become larger and brighter.  i called for my sister to come and look at what was in the sky.  i called her several times more, and after what seemed to be forever she came out and observed the orbs which were getting closer and brighter but seeming to change color to a more orange/red, with less yellow, yet just as bright.  these objects made absolutely no noise.  as they got closer, their shape began to become more round than oval. although i have never seen one, for some reason, i thought maybe these were chinese lanterns that people describe as seeing.  my sister went back into the house to get her camera and as she did a third and then a fourth light appeared, all in a straight line, exactly the same distance apart all moving very slowly towards us and continuing to angle away in a straight line.  they seemed to be slowly moving and yet hovering at the same time.  my sister came back out and i pointed out the other new objects to her.  she started to take some digital pictures using her phone.  i then turned on the video camera on my phone and began to film.  as the objects moved slowly towards us i noticed they all slowed to almost a complete stop and speed up together.  the distance between them remained a constant.  as the got closer, there was still no noise at all.  then as if by design the straight row of four lights began to somehow turn straight upward with the first object leading the way.  they ascended upward to the north, on an angle and just ever so slowly lift up and away with the first object dimming and fading, getting smaller, with the distance between the first object and the second becoming greater. the second object followed the first in the same manner as well as the third object.  however, the last remaining object stopped moving altogether and just hovered above for what seemed to me to be forever but was actually maybe 30 seconds.  none the less, it did not move in any direction.  then, just like the rest, it just sped straight up into the night sky and it was gone.  this whole episode lasted maybe four minutes.  my sister took several digital pictures.  for some reason, only one photo was in her gallery. the picture that was remaining has no color.  it is as if it is a black and white photo.  strange.  i did manage to get 3 minutes and 20 seconds of video.  the video seems to be bouncing around quite a bit.  i thought i was holding pretty steady but i guess not.  i think the movement of the objects and my inexperience in cinematography might have something to do with it.  i am going to download this video onto this report.  i am not very computer literate so there are no guaranties. if they don't load please contact me and maybe i can submit the file some other way. in any event,  i don't know how i feel about what i encountered this evening. it was so bizarre that if it wasn't for another witness i'd wonder if i had just imagined the whole thing.  somehow, i feel like what i witnessed tonight was not of this world.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed unidentified objects hovering across the sky

content.detailedDescription: Sometime between 11pm and 12am on may 1st/2nd.. i, along with two others, witnessed something we couldn't explain. i was in the car with my father and a friend of his going down hwy 268. it started off as a strange bouncing light, i was in the backseat of a vehicle so the driver saw it first. he pulled over into the parking lot of a closed gas station, we all then exited the vehicle and began trying to record with our phones. from what i could tell my phone would not pick up the strange light so i ended it and began snapping pictures. i took 4-5 pictures as close together as possible. it changed colors and shape. the last one ending in a rainbow type shape. fading from an orangish red to a green. to our eyes we saw it almost take on the shape of a person glowing green, orangish red, and white. at one point a smaller, paler orange light seemed to come from it and to run around it in almost the blink of an eye one time. i later discovered my video indeed captured this ufo. that's unidentified flying object, as i really am confused about what i saw. what i know is, to my knowledge, this isn't any craft we're aware of that currently exists in our reality. it jumped, it seemed to change course without stopping, it bounced and it changed altitude. going up and down very quickly. after taking the last rainbow shape picture, my grandmother called me to see if i was safe at home. something she always does. i'm telling her about this strange thing we're seeing and the light gets the brightest it has so far, turning completely green. at this exact moment my grandmother began speaking gibberish, at first i assumed she thought i was joking and was playing along and acting goofy. i quickly figured out when i could hear panic in her tone she wasn't playing. i began yelling "mamaw! mamaw! what's wrong?!" she attempted to answer me but it was all mushy and sounded like it started with an em sound. i alerted my father to this and he was like "let's go to her." she lived near by. i actually didn't connect the light and this until after what happened next. my grandmother has cancer, and i actually thought she was have a seizure from this. my dad grabbed the phone and attempted to yell "we're coming mama!" instead the mush she was speaking now came out of his mouth. it sounded like it started with a jay sound. i really hate that i can't recall what the "word" was. at this point, though, i was in shock and panic. i actually felt this sickening feeling before my grandmother called, and spoke her mush. this thing that was in the sky felt wrong. it was like a knot and nausea in my stomach. i felt sick. when we began driving toward my grandmother's home, located off of hwy 268, it seemed to be following us. almost playing with us. i also got the feeling i was a bug being sucked into a bug zapper. amazed and also full of fear. my grandmother was ok upon making it to her home. she has never had the gibberish happen to her before, and she didn't know what caused it. the light outside was being watched by my father and his friend. they said it just got dimmer and dimmer until it seemed to move far away. they could no longer see it. i was fearful of it, so i wished for no further contact. i thought i wanted to see something like this, until i saw it. i'm afraid. i also would like to mention that as we were heading toward my grandmother's house we saw multiple cats and dogs on the side of the road, not just in one spot. as if something bothered them. it also seemed to make time feel different, slower or faster. i'm not sure. when i say it messed with electricity it was like our body's "electricity". that's the best way i can describe it.
content.summary: The ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting at the bus stop on north camano island, terry's corner. i was facing east and there were broken clouds over the mountains in the distance, when i saw a very large rectangular light on a huge rectangular black ship sticking through the clouds.  as i was reaching for my cellphone to take a picture the ship moved into the cloud cover, and out of sight. i knew it was a ufo because i was trained as a lookout in the navy to report one if i saw it.  i felt disappointed that i couldn't get my cellphone out fast enough to get the picture.
content.summary: Huge dark rectangular object with bright light in cloud cover.

content.detailedDescription:
I had been inside on the computer when my mother got my attention. she had been out on the front porch smoking a cigarette when she just looked over in the ufo's direction. it was something that just normally wasn't there. when i first saw it, i immediately suspected it to be a ufo because it was too big to be a star, it wasn't a planet because the moon was behind our house, and it was hovering so i knew it wasn't a plane or anything like that. as we, my brother, my mother, and i, stood out there the object didn't move but it was pulsating and hovering above the trees. i came back inside after first seeing it to get the binoculars so that i could possibly see it better, maybe see what all there was to it. but they didn't help, just made the object seem blurry but with just looking at it with my own eyes, it was sort of clear. it didn't move for a good five minutes after we all saw it. but about a couple minutes later, it began to slowly descend behind the trees so it became difficult to see it with the binoculars but i could see it with my own eyes. my brother says that when he looked at it through the binoculars it was like an oval/cigar shape. but when i had looked at it, maybe two minutes before he had, it was like a teardrop shape.
since i had my phone, i pulled it out and opened my flashlight app and began to make it do the pattern the ufo was doing. it was a steady one, two, three, one, two, three. and as i was doing this, the object began to glow brighter and seemed to turn a bit. so i believe i made some sort of contact with whoever or whatever it was.
this isn't the first time we've seen something over around in our area. my mother mentioned that she has witnessed something similar off and on for the pass four years. she says that when she has seen it in the south to the southeast, it's been moving slowly until it begins to fade away and then it's moving faster. but every time it's been near our home, north/northwest, it has hovered.
during this recent sighting, the object didn't move until about ten minutes after the initial sighting. and it slowly descended behind the trees until i just couldn't see it anymore. i'm honestly a little...Scared now that i've actually witnessed a ufo and now that it has been around here for the pass four years...
content.summary: Seemed to pulsate and hover over the trees before descending slowly

content.detailedDescription: I was having a side security light that kept going off. i thought it might be something like a raccoon on roof. i was trying to keep them out of the vents where they went for warmth. i had a ladder set up off patio to get to roof quickly. i took out the screen and held my camera phone out the window. i set the security light at most sensitive and when it went off as something activated the sensor i snapped a picture. i put phone down and ran out back door and up the ladder it took 2 min to get up to the roof. nothing was there but there was a green light overhead. i went back and looked at the pic. there is something that was caught in the beam i had directed up at the roof, something looking over the edge that set off the sensor. can you provide an email address for me to send photo my windows phone will not let me send via the form here. i really want someone to look at this pic and give me a professional opinion.
content.summary: Bright green light then snapped pic of something on my rooftop

content.detailedDescription: Me and 2friends snuck out of home wen we were in high school, we noticed firework looking lights over mexico mountains (around mt. chisto ray) as we thought a celebration was happening and kept lookin for more fireworks but we don't see anymore and we noticed the ones we saw weren't fading or anything like air fireworks do not even burn out to nothing. me and friends were puzzled as we kept lookin at it it kept getting over and closer moving slowly until it was right on top of us flying over us in formation wit one big light in front then like 4 or 5 after it like four corners of square formation then the rest of lights were grouped after it in different lengths away from the ones in front and some of them were grouped together then there was 1or2 at the very end following the all moved in formation same direction no sound at all and and all looked same in tracer color and the first one was biggest next 4or5 little smaller in size then all the ones after were smaller except the last ones the were maybe same size as the 4or5 behind 1st one. we were amazed and where astonished that we jus saw ufos flying over us. we all excited and mesmerized by war we saw and as. we kept lookin at it it slowly kept flying in formation same speed flying towards new mexico until it was out of our site due to trees further in the direction. we all separated and went home before parents woke up and i wanted to tell my mom so wen i got home woke her up and i told her and she thought i was crazy n told me to go back to bed. but ever since i have been seeing hanger 1 on tv and searched mufon on internet i figured i'd tell u my story and i'm sure my friends wud confirm also, but i was in high school and now in my 40s so don't kno where they are but i remember their names n can find on fb! thank you for ur time and maybe one day we'll all kno the truth bout these sitings
content.summary: Was late nite me & 2 friends saw from mexico; over us and towards new mexico

content.detailedDescription: Driving north on route 140 taunton ma.Glowing object seemed to travel parallel to my vehicle at 500 ft or less.Then came to hovering stop over a apartment complex.It made no noise.Fascinating.
content.summary: Noticed what looked like a star at no more than 500 feet

content.detailedDescription: Got off of work at 11 pm, dropped my coworker on the highway running northward of atkins, arkansas (105), coming back at about 11:45 i noticed something in my upward field of view. i was about 3 miles from atkins. observed an object, giving off an apparent trail of either smoke or ejecta. initially thought it was a missle or asteroid, due to it's steep angle. at about 500-800 feet it flashed so brightly i thought it exploded, and it's speed increased to double what it was before, maybe faster.Before the flash/explosion the object was only really noticeable by it's trail and low altidude but after the flash it seemed to be much more bright and reflective, the whole thing was intact after the bright flash, it went over the treeline, going behind the ridge line that lies parallel with the highway and out of my sight. i only observed it for about 10 or 15 seconds, and it was too far away to truly ascertain what it looked like. it could very well have been a military craft or missle, but the bright flash and increased visibility of the trail makes me think otherwise, my country is not at war and we are far from any testing range, the only thing it looked similar too was an air bursting meteor, my experience with such things are limited but it does not seem it would have been that bright. i am also hearing loud noises that sound like far away explosions, have been since i arrived at midnight. instantly i was overcame with excitement at seeing the object, i'd never seen anything like it before, i was disappointing i was not able to film it or see it longer than i did.
content.summary: Ufo approximately 30 feet long, maybe 3-5 feet wide traveling at steep angle toward ground. rapidly accelerates, leaving behind bright trail. pulsed brightly before accelerating.

content.detailedDescription: In the mid nineties  i was walking across the street to work going east. it was 10 to 6 am and the sun was half an hour from rising, as it was winter.  as i crossed the street, i caught sight of what i thought was a large [falling star] it seemed to have the same speed of the average meteor. it was coming in at a 45 degree angle from the se and straight east of my line of vision it did a slight curve upward to a 2"0clock angle at the same speed.It paused a half sec.,then shot off  straight north and was gone in a second, reminded me of star trek warp speed. i only told my family about this and they thought i was loco. so, i never mentioned it again.  could it have been a meteor skipping across the upper atmosphere?   thats my story and i am sticking to it.
content.summary: Saw what i thought was a [falling star]45 degrees from se .Stopped in mid air. went back   up  backwards at 10 degree angle,  stopped for half second  took off like warp speed and dissapeared to north .   .

content.detailedDescription: At about 11pm on thurs. nite, april 30, i went to close my bedroom window facing south and i noticed a very large and bright elongated light shimmering and morphing in a stationary position, seeming only a mile or two away. i thought maybe it was a tall light setup they use during the night on freeway construction projects. but this was not acting like a stationary construction light. it was just way too bright. so i went outside and had to pull out an 8ft ladder to see it above the treeline.It stayed in that first configuration until helicopters arrived then it seemed to get agitated and changed from a sphered to a raging vortex. the vidcam lenses only portrayed it as a sphere or vortex, yet to the naked eye it appeared elongated and morphing into all kinds of elongated shapes. the moon, later that morning, also exhibited the same vidcam look. and it moved in the sky , bathed in an eerie brown to ochre colored cirrus . it was not the moon and made me feel nauseated,.Confused, panicked and tired. after 5 hrs of filming it, i went to bed.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large shimmering molten morphing light ascending descending to naked eye but vidcam captured it as a sphere

content.detailedDescription: It was a very clear night on my husbands family farm in nebraska. my husband and i were in town for a family reunion and decided to go camping on a family members 80 acre farm.  no one lived there but was still owned by family.  we went smack dab in the middle of the farm.  we were laying at our tent facing south counting shooting stars and satellites. there were a lot of shooting stars that night. more than i have ever seen in my life.  next thing we know we are sitting up facing north facing our tent and saw a very bright flash behind us. the light was blinding bright.  we looked back towards the house but no lights on.  we commented on the flash because we were not close to the house or any roads so there should not have been any lights at all!  we check our watches and realized it was 2 hours later and we both had a mark on our leg.  mine on inside left calf his outside right calf. my husband went to dr a week later regarding his mark and they said it was a bug bite and its still present today. 18 yrs later we still do not know what happened during that lost time.  we still have our marks.  we saw your show and people so vividly remember their experiences.  we are baffled as to why we can not remember ours.
content.summary: Saw bright flash

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend watched it for over a hour. it moved slow n seemed like it was either looking for something n didn't care (apparently ) who or what saw it. cuz it spent a long time up on the hill about a half mile away. it dawned on me later it was over the goodwin farm . n above the cattle area. but it was silent the entire time. n slowly moved south west n passed over our house n we couldn't believe how huge it was . it had 5 lights evenly spaced n was a triangle n as it passed over it completely blocked out the sky. n the echo from noise on the ground sounded like we were standing in a stadium..That's how huge it was. me n my friend [name removed/dr/cms] ..Was completely excited but knew no 1 would believe  us. so we never talked about it. my mom being very christian. .Was scared n being a logical mind , knew what she saw. i was the 1 to tell her that it didn't mean god didn't exist ..Cuz christ said he had 'others' he ministered to. so don't loose ur faith . it completely changed my life tho. but i haven't 'chased the sky' so to say. i figured if or when 'they' would wanna talk ..'they'd' knock on my door some day . i like that there are others who have seen n witnessed things. i spent yrs in the military . and around the ocean n seen other 'things' but still nothing like i did back then. if they wanted, 'they ' could have taken us ...But didn't, (that i know of. lol )
content.summary: Moved slowly from the north ..N we thought it was helicopters in formation. .Until we knew there was no sound. n we realized what we were seeing ..N my mom saw it n freaked out. when she called the police ..They said they were already getting calls .

content.detailedDescription: We where going down the road when a object appeared on the on ramp of interstate 95 in va the event was brief it was a triangular object with lights on each corner it was at the tree line my reaction was i was shocked not literally i was scared at first sight and my heart is still raceing quickly the lights flashed in no order and the object zig zaged until it diapered i also felt a weird pressure and i still have a head ace and no extra terrestrials where seen.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Triangular shape hovered darted side to side lights flickered random at random times at tree line

content.detailedDescription: I was with two friends driving north from walmart in prairie du chien wisconsin and noticed lights over a smoke tower that previously had no lights on it and when we approached the tower we pulled into a dairy q and when telling the story tomorrow to pull friends there are more than 5 people that have seen the same object multiple times in the same townueen parking lot and got out of the vehicle and noticed a triangle shaped object making no noise floating above the mlps smoke tower of the prairie du chien prison we watch the object hover for more than 5 to 10 minutes and suddenly it took off faster than anything i've ever seen in my life and disappeared over the horizon within 1 to 2 seconds after speaking with multiple people there are more than five to ten people that i've seen the same object multiple times in the same area over the prison and i have seen it on one other occasion about a mile from my residence.
content.summary: Triangle hovering over prison for ten minutes the flew at least mach10 to the south and disappeared over horizon

content.detailedDescription: We saw what looked like a green falling  star move downward in lightning speed, then disappear in the atmosphere
content.summary: We saw what looked like a green falling  star move downward in lightning speed, then disappear in the atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: I was at my computer, suddenly out of the corner lf my eye, i saw a bright light. i looked through the window and saw this light (similar to a star) zoom down and back up. when it was coming back up, it left a light grey shadow. the shadow stayed there for a few seconds after the "star" remained still. at first sight i thought it was a shooting star, but when it went back up, i knew. right after i took a photo of the bright object. this happened at 9:29 pm. soon after (10:16 pm) i saw the star zoom farther down behind trees. still very bright because i can see it. one of my friends texted me saying he saw it too. i'm not sure if it let out a noise, because my windows were closed. first photo is after it zoomed up and down. second, is when it zoomed down behind trees, still in the sky.
content.summary: Bright

content.detailedDescription:
My son called and said he just saw a bright neon green flying craft the shape of a boomerang which was about 20 feet long and spinning right in front of him when he was driving on the garden state parkway at mile marker 67 in barnegat, nj 08050 at approx. 9:50pm, may 1st.
he said the green neon boomerang shaped craft was approximately 20 feet long and spinning over the opposite traffic lane and then looked like it bounced in mid-air and then disappeared.
the entire event lasted only a few seconds.
content.summary: Bright green neon boomerang shape, spinning, bounced in mid-air then dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: Was out bike riding with my husband and we watched a plane come in to their flight path and then noticed an object in the sky, shaped like a dome  one minute it wa there and then it was gone, at first we thought maybe a bird and the sun catching it, it was white and not really coming at us or moving at all, it was there and it was gone
content.summary: Saw something in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I am so relieved that there is a venue to post this.I have carried this with me for so long! the event happened in 1993 while taking an evening stroll in october along with a friend. as we walked south ( towards lake erie ) in our subdivision, we noticed something in the sky over the lake. we assumed it was a plane with a burned out red light, but found it odd that it was not flying across the sky. it hovered over the lake for over ten minutes...We stared not knowing what it was. then, all of a sudden, the green light/object, descended down, then up again and out of sight!!! we were terrified. 

i called the rcmp still thinking that it was a small aircraft that crashed into the lake. i gave them my contact information telling them that i was not high, not drunk, not tired....About one hour later, they called me back to inform me that they had no information about any aircraft in the area. i was very scared.  i then told them that i was glad to report this in the event anyone else had witnessed it and they would have a record. 

this has remained unexplained to me for many years. my family and friends have known about this sighting. i searched over and over again and wondered who could / would hear this story. i knew / and know that i did not invent this/ i know what i saw. this light should not have been just hovering over the lake. that was not normal.

i am finally relieved to be able to find this venue to post. maybe others have witnessed this too.
we still live in the same house and i have never witnessed anything like this again.

i thought at first that it was a flare....But a flare doesn't last that long...And it doesn't hover...And it doesn't have a lime green, shimmering/glowing colour.....And it doesn't descent and then ascend and take off !!

i am not going crazy. 

thank you for permitting me to post this strange apparition. would love to know if anyone else ever noticed anything like it. i live in kingsville ontario....This happened over lake erie.

thank you again. ps....Your form wouldn't permit me to enter my province; so i had to submit that i lived in usa in the state of ohio....My country is canada and live in the province, as mentioned earlier, ontario.
content.summary: Thought it was plane with red light out,didn't fly, it glowed bright green,hovered over lake erie descended, up and gone!

content.detailedDescription: While at work at a local lumber yard we watched a very large group of ufos cross the sky with some clouds blocking total view but there were over 100 crafts of all different size and shape i have no way to know what there destination was going to be
content.summary: Large group of ships crossing sky

content.detailedDescription: We were on highway 63 and saw a yellowish green bright glowing light traveling along the river. it was going upstream about 30 to 40 mph and traveling over the bridges. we stopped on the bridge and watched it follow the chicasahay river, about 30 yards from us. it was big, about 40 to 50 feet, it was going over the pine trees. there were no boats in the water at that time. we heard no noise or sound coming from it.
content.summary: We were on highway 63 and saw a yellowish green bright glowing light traveling along the river.

content.detailedDescription:
My step-son and i were walking out to our turkey hunting location at 5;10 a.M. 15 april 2015. we hunt on a 40 acre parcel in central dane, county, wi. it was the first day of hunting during our time period. we hunt on private land and no other hunters are allowed on the property. there are scattered homes in the area but there are no visible farm lights or yard lights where we hunt. we have hunted this property in the past and are friends of the owners.
we checked our watches and turned to walk to our hunting hide outs. my step-son noticed a light 400 yards distant traveling across the open and elevated farm field from ne to sw along the neighbor's fence line. the trees along this line are scattered and had no leaves on them at the time of the incident. the relative humidity was very low that day in fact red flag warnings were up for fire danger and there was no dew present on the grass, our cars, boots etc. a crescent moon was low on the se horizon and skies were clear with only thin alto-cirrus horsetails beginning to form in the early morning sky. winds se and light at 5-7 mph.  we were walking due east across the corn field from our cars. the car headlights were not on and the cars had been tuned off for about 12 minutes. looking across the field stubble he commented that it looked like someone else was driving in from the neighbor's side toward us. the light reached a gate opening in the fence line which is 25 feet wide and it turned through the opening toward us. height above the ground was 10-12 feet the entire time. the light was bright white at center and fuzzy blue to blue-green at the outer edges and pulsed as it traveled. it also changed shape from round to oval as we watched it come toward us. the light maintained its altitude but started to zig-zag south then north then south, then north. we thought it might be a very tall jogger? then thought it was a person on horseback? this left then right sequence lasted for a count of 8 seconds. we continued to observe and walk toward it closing the distance between it and us by about 150 feet determined to find out what we were seeing.We were concerned that there might be other hunters on the property that  were un-aware of our presence and thus creating an un-safe situation.  by the count of 9 seconds the light simply vanished-gone. there was no sound. i then took a flashlight out of my pocket and shined it in the direction of last contact expecting to see something out there reflecting back- nothing.
my step-son and i spoke very little, trying to make sense of what we had just seen? we agreed to continue the hunt but to text each other once we got set-up at our separate hides. we saw nothing else related that morning. at 10:00 a.M. we agreed to meet on the property and hunt together. we made a pact to not discuss what we had witnessed while we were still on the property. we decided to write down our own individual recollections as soon as we got back to our own separate vehicles. our individual recollections, distances, descriptions, were almost identical once we exchanged our written notes.

after my step-son left the property i went back out to the field and paced off the distances from where we first observed the light crossing the open gate entrance to where the light vanished in mid field during that 8 second count time frame. i am a trained forester and distance measurement is something i do everyday. the object traveled 135 yards in 8 seconds. that is 400 feet, which is 50 feet per second, which is 34 mph. there were no reflective posts on the property such as snowmobile trail markers. the property is not posted with trespassing signs of any kind. there were no tire tracks in the adjacent field or field we were on. no footprints left by any four-footed animals such as a tall horse. there was no hard evidence on the ground. no burn marks. no fabric, nothing reflective. 

whatever we saw for that 8 seconds was there and then simply vanished without a sound or a trace. i have been in the outdoors all my life. i have camped, bushwhacked, canoed, slept out in all weather, all seasons from the arctic ocean to the florida everglades and i have never had an experience as this that i cannot explain.
content.summary: Glowing object. 12

content.detailedDescription: Went out side and looked up at a hawk flying over and saw a dark  cylinder glowing very red in the sky. it was very high in the sky because i saw two jets traveling in different directions near to it in the sky. i believe it was as large as the jets. while i was watching it, it turned 90 degrees and i saw the sun reflect off of it, it was very red in the center and more faded towards the edges. when it turned, it went north and i lost sight of it. it made no sound and it was a clear day.
content.summary: Went out side and looked up at a hawk flying over and saw a dark  cylinder glowing very red in the sky

content.detailedDescription: My brother and 2 friends of mine stepped outside to smoke around 10-11 pm in north salem, or on the date of april 29th, 2015. i looked up and noticed what i thought was a small faint satellite far in the distance, i've seen many of them and don't think anything of them. it looked extremely high up in the sky, higher than a normal aircraft would fly. i watched it for about 3 second and to my surprise the faint light faded and was replaced with a pulsating bright red light, and it looked bigger now than it was when it was just a white light. at that point i had gotten my brother and friends attention and tried to point it out to them, i saw it stop abruptly in its tracks and change back to the white light after about 5 seconds of the pulsating red light. my brother and friends did not see it in time as i was still attempting to point it out to them and they were trying to find it. what looked like either a plane or a helicopter passed underneath it while it was stationary, and i was able to use that as a marker to point it out to them as it passed underneath. however, by the time they saw it, it was of course back to a faint white star, and it had stopped moving. it literally only looked like a star now. i don't know if they believed me, but i know what i saw. i am intelligent and educated with no history of hallucinations or mental illness. anyway, i watched it intently for about 2 minutes and it did not move. over the next 5-10 minutes i glanced at it every now and then with the same result. no movement. i know it was not a star. and i don't believe it was any aircraft either, it looked much too high in the sky. not just a little too high, very very high. i would have tried to get pictures or video of it, but my cellphone camera is not advanced enough to even photograph the  moon at night.
content.summary: Looked similar to a moving star/sattelite at first, changed into a blinking red light, then changed back to a

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was driving nw along hwy 20 away from the town of sisters before reaching black butte ranch.  i dipped my head down slightly to get a better look at the butte and then i noticed a silver spherical object hovering somewhere above the height of the tree line ahead of me and before the butte.  it only remained there a brief moment before shooting eastward over the treeline with a slightly erratic path.  the entire sighting only lasted a two or three seconds; but it was during daylight, the object was well lit by sunlight and close enough that i could see any details that would identify it as a regular craft such as a helicopter.  instead it looked like a silvery spherical object that appeared fuzzy as though it had heat ripples around it.  it was far enough away that if it had been a loosed balloon it should have been much smaller and not hovered/accelerated like it did.
content.summary: Silver object hovered then left view over trees with erratic path

content.detailedDescription:
I was filming a diamond twin star plane before the event using infrared on a panasonic w-850 camcorder using a 900nm infrared filter. 

the ufo flew out of cloud cover into the open. i did not see this on the viewfinder, with my naked eye (and i was watching) 

i did not hear the buzzing of the ufo either in realtime. this was only apparent when i uploaded and watched the video on my computer. 

the ufo shot out from under cloud cover in a south westerly direction and shot across the clear open sky , travelling in a south easterly direction.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Daytime ufo shot out from behind cloud cover

content.detailedDescription: On christmas evening about seven thirty i was out walking my dog, it was cold and therefore frosty, the stars were exceptionally bright. as i was looking at the stars, i looked at what looked like orion's belt, but it was in the wrong place in the night sky. the thought had no sooner crossed my mind when all three " stars" started to move, one much faster than the other two, the front one turned sharply south and quickly moved off at speed, the others still travelling slower, then turned also and shot off very rapidly also to the south towards edinburgh.
content.summary: I observed what i at first thought was orion's belt, however all three flew off at speed
